## Quick Start: ALS Movielens Example (Python)

```Python
from recommenders.datasets.movielens import load_movielens_lastfm
from recommenders.models.als import Als
from recommenders.evaluation.python_evaluation import precision_at_k, recall_at_k

# Load data
ratings = load_movielens_lastfm(size='100k')

# Initialize and train ALS model
als_model = Als(k=10, impl='python', regularization=0.01, iterations=20)
als_model.fit(ratings)

# Predict and evaluate (example)
# predictions = als_model.predict(user_id, item_id)
# print(precision_at_k(ratings, predictions, k=10))
# print(recall_at_k(ratings, predictions, k=10))
```

## Factorization Machine (FM) & Field-Aware FM (FFM) Example

```Python
Algorithm: xLearn/Factorization Machine (FM) & Field-Aware FM (FFM)
Type: Collaborative Filtering
Description: Quick and memory efficient algorithm to predict labels with user/item features. It works in the CPU/GPU environment.
Example: examples/02_model_collaborative_filtering/fm_deep_dive.ipynb
```

## Quick Start: SAR Movielens Example (Python)

```Python
from recommenders.datasets.movielens import load_movielens_lastfm
from recommenders.models.sar import SAR
from recommenders.evaluation.python_evaluation import precision_at_k, recall_at_k

# Load data
ratings = load_movielens_lastfm(size='100k')

# Initialize and train SAR model
sar_model = SAR(k=10, time_decay=0.01, time_now=1000000000)
sar_model.fit(ratings)

# Predict and evaluate (example)
# predictions = sar_model.predict(user_id, item_id)
# print(precision_at_k(ratings, predictions, k=10))
# print(recall_at_k(ratings, predictions, k=10))
```

## Quick Start: NCF Movielens Example (Python)

```Python
from recommenders.datasets.movielens import load_movielens_lastfm
from recommenders.models.ncf import NCF
from recommenders.evaluation.python_evaluation import precision_at_k, recall_at_k

# Load data
ratings = load_movielens_lastfm(size='100k')

# Initialize and train NCF model
ncf_model = NCF(k=10, embedding_dim=50, learning_rate=0.001, batch_size=256, epochs=50, num_neg=4, mlp_hidden_size=[64, 32, 16],)
ncf_model.fit(ratings)

# Predict and evaluate (example)
# predictions = ncf_model.predict(user_id, item_id)
# print(precision_at_k(ratings, predictions, k=10))
# print(recall_at_k(ratings, predictions, k=10))
```

## Create Prediction Data for Logloss Example

```python
prob_true = 0.6

df_pred_bin_pos = df_true_bin_pos.copy()
df_pred_bin_pos[COL_PREDICTION] = df_pred_bin_pos[COL_PREDICTION].apply(lambda x: prob_true if x==1 else 1-prob_true)

df_pred_bin_pos
```
